nodes.text: The Kuat system was a star system located in the Kuat sector of the Core Worlds. It contained the planet Kuat. Most of the Kuat system consisted of large shipyards owned by Kuat Drive Yards.

During the Clone Wars, twenty-four Acclamator-class assault ships were deployed along the outer borders of the Kuat system in response to the gathering of a dozen Trade Federation battleships around Balmorra.
